title.rendered: Tiger Master’s Excellence Scholarships for International Students 2024

content.rendered:
We are thrilled to announce the availability of the Tiger Master’s Excellence Scholarships for International Students at Aix-Marseille University for the upcoming 2024 academic session. Talented and qualified candidates are invited to apply for these prestigious scholarships.

Contents on This Page

Toggle
  • Tiger Master’s Excellence Scholarships for Students | DETAILS
  • Eligibility Criteria
  • Application Procedures
    • How-to-Apply

At Aix-Marseille University, we value the importance of international diversity and strive to foster a global learning environment. To further this objective, we have established the Tiger Master’s Excellence Scholarships to support exceptional students who possess outstanding academic achievements. This program aims to offer financial support to deserving individuals.

We encourage all eligible applicants to seize this opportunity and submit their applications for the Tiger Master’s Excellence Scholarships at Aix-Marseille University. Join us in our commitment to academic excellence and international collaboration.

Scholarship Sponsor(s): Aix-Marseille University, France

Host Institution(s): Aix-Marseille University, France

Scholarship Worth: 10 000€ & Accommodation

Number of Awards: Several

Study Level: Masters

Nationality: Domestic & International Students

Tiger Master’s Excellence Scholarships for Students | DETAILS

There is no need for students to take any additional steps: only the application file requested by each master must be submitted via the appropriate application platform.
Many students apply each year for these programmes and only a small number of them are selected on the basis of the quality of their application and are awarded the TIGER Master Excellence Scholarship.

Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible for Tiger Master’s Excellence Scholarships for International Students, applicants are expected to meet the following conditions:

  • Applications are open for all nationalities
  • Applicants must be ready to enrol in Masters degree program
  • Applicants must enrol in full-time program
  • Master in Microbiology, Integrative and Fundamental Microbiology track
  • Master of Nanosciences and Nanotechnologies, Nanoscale and quantum engineering (NQE) / Nano-ingénierie et dispositifs quantiques (NDQ) track
  • Master of Nanosciences and Nanotechnologies (co-accredited with the Ecole des Mines de Saint-Etienne – Campus de Gardanne), Chemical Nano-Engineering (CNE) track (ErasmusMundus)
  • Master of Physics, Europhotonics (ErasmusMundus)
  • Master of Physics, FunPhys
  • Master of Mechanics, Fluids and Solids
  • Master of Mathematics and Applications – Computer Science, Computer Science and Discrete Mathematics track
  • Master of Integrative Biology and Physiology (BIP)
  • Master in Instrumentation, Measurement and Metrology
  • Master Computational and Mathematical Biology
  • Master Biomedical Engineering (taught by our partner Ecole Centrale Marseille)
  • Master Environmental Engineering (given by our partner Ecole Centrale Marseille)
  • Master of Public Health, Quantitative and Econometric Methods for Health Research (MQERS)
  • Master of Public Health, Societies and Development (SPSD)
  • Master’s degree in Archaeology, sciences for archaeology, Momarch course
  • Master Geography, planning, environment and development: Geomatics and spatial modeling course
  • Master’s degree in Biodiversity, Ecology and Evolution (BEE), Biodiversity: functions and conservation course
  • Master’s degree in Environmental Management, MAEVA course – Environmental Management, Valuation and Analysis
  • Master’s degree in Marine Sciences, course in Biological Oceanography and Marine Ecology (OBEM)
  • Master’s degree in Marine Sciences, course in Physical and Biogeochemical Oceanography (OPB).

Scholarship Benefits

Successful applicants for Tiger Master’s Excellence Scholarships for International Students, applicants will receive the following benefits:

  • Aix-Marseille Université finances you up to 10 000€ for one academic year
  • Aix-Marseille Université will book a room for you in a CROUS university residence (provided you complete the necessary procedures within the allotted time)
  • Aix-Marseille Université will take care of you as soon as you arrive in France and will accompany you throughout your stay.

Application Procedures

How-to-Apply

To apply for Tiger Master’s Excellence Scholarships for International Students, applicants should please follow these steps:

Step 1: I choose my master’s programme from among the eligible courses.
Step 2: I submit my application for the programme of my choice (via the appropriate platform according to my personal situation).
Step 3: The masters’ directors study the applications and select those who will be awarded the scholarship.
Step 4 : I receive my letter of admission to the master.
Step 5: Shortly afterwards, I will be informed if I have been granted the TIGER Master Excellence Scholarship. 

Visit the Official Website for Further Details
